JobDescribe:
· POSITION OBJECTIVE
To maximize drive LBP sales and profits for a given SBU or sales territory by developing and coaching his/her respective sales team.
Develop and implement sales strategies.
 
·          MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES


1.     Drive LBP sales growth in north region.
2.     To support LBP win orders of manufacturing.
3.     To promote plant into China market with LBP together.
4.     To be a coordinator between LBP and plant for increasing business and OTD.
5.     Proactively taking the lead in major project pursuits, developing project pursuit strategies and account management.
6.     Assure that all customer requests are answered promptly and correctly.
7.     Provide leadership in developing the sales territory into new industries and accounts.
8.     Assist manager in terminating staff as required per company policy. Provide recommendations to upper management on additional head count requirements.
9.     Assess training needs of sales staff and develop a training plan, with assistance by HR, to meet these needs.
10.   Provide semi-annual performance reviews for sales staff per company policy. Provide input for salary planning process to recommend salary increase and career development and promotion for key high-potential staff.
11.   Provide input on market conditions in the region to marketing staff.
12.   Interface with other organizations to help resolve problems to ensure overall customer satisfaction.
 
·         SCOPE
 
1.     Authorized to issue / approve discounts, per the authorized discount schedule distributed to the sales force.
2.     Authorized to issue quotes, quotes with greater value will require regional sales manager’s / business manager’s signature.
3.     Supervise sales team members and administration support staff.
4.     Interaction with senior F-R management and other world sales and marketing management.
5.     Responsible for individual / team / regional sales goals; per the assigned bookings targets set at the start of the FY.
6.     Substantial interaction with customers at all levels.
·         JOB COMPETENCIES


1.     Strong interpersonal, communication and planning / priority management skills.
2.     Strong leadership qualities and strategic thinking
3.     Customer-oriented and able to win customers’ trust.
4.     Good commercial knowledge.
5.     Good working knowledge of computer.
 
 
·         EDUCATION/TRAINING/EXPERIENCE
1.     Strong technical knowledge of the relevant product(s).
2.     Conversant in Mandarin and English – both spoken and written.
3.     5 to 10 years of post-graduate working experience, with at least the last 5 years in the instrumentation business.
4.     Minimum of 2 years of direct management or supervisory experience.
